Name: [Artifice] Sensory Poker
Desc:
For {CReplaceCardParam:ProgressLeft,1,2} combats, <color=#CF4029>lose all Energy and Decibels</color> upon being hit by an enemy attack.
Once reconstructed, Agents will instead generate Energy and Decibels <color=#2BAD00>25%</color> faster.
Desc2: Not only does he know which card you chose, he also knows that your awe and praise are insincere.
